mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Morrison, James H.
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Lannington, Fayette Co., Penn [Lannington, Fayette County, Pennsylvania]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Morrison, James H. Patient Age: 28. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Saber flesh wound right hand. Gun shot flesh wound left abdominal [parietes]. Nature of Wound: Pistol ball. Result: Returned to duty.
